type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Epoli](https://epoli-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Redstone

---

_Entity Action Type_

This will teleport the player back to the world spawn or their spawn point.

Type ID: `epoli:teleport_to_spawn`

---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
	"type": "epoli:teleport_to_spawn",
	"player_spawn": false
}
```
This example will teleport the entity to the world spawn point.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Teleport To Spawn (Entity Action Type) date: 22-04-2022

Redstone

Entity Action Type

This will teleport the player back to the world spawn or their spawn point.

Type ID: epoli:teleport_to_spawn

Fields

Field Type Default Description
player_spawn Boolean false If it will teleport to the players spawn not world spawn.

Examples

"entity_action": {
	"type": "epoli:teleport_to_spawn",
	"player_spawn": false
}

This example will teleport the entity to the world spawn point.
